import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-not-admin', templateUrl: './not-admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./not-admin.component.css'] }) export class NotAdminComponent implements OnInit { constructor( public UService:UsersService){} users:any; ngOnInit(): void { this.UService.GetAllUsers().subscribe({ next:(data)=>{ // console.log(data) this.users = data; }, error:(err)=>{console.log(err)} }) } }
